isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500, 8600 Models Built Before 05/20/2003 - ENGINES - Caterpillar C10, C12 ENGINES

svcsubsecinfo.para: Discussion of the Caterpillar C10, C12 Engine, in this section, is limited to the engine electronic control module (ECM) power circuits and data link connectivity. The engine controller has its own diagnostic system and uses flash codes displayed by the ENGINE warning lights. For detailed information on Caterpillar engine diagnostics, refer to the appropriate Caterpillar Manual.
